Sentencas: LaSrAl1-xMgxO4-delta(x= 0.0-0.3) layered perovskites were synthesized by a nitrate-citrate route followed by annealing in air at 1100 degrees C, and studied as potential electrolyte materials in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The products obtained were initially characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The compounds were indexed to theI4/mmmspace group with K2NiF4-type structure.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: Neutron powder diffraction data were collected to determine the crystallographic features.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: A complementary study of pellets sintered at 1400 degrees C was performed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS), and the segregation of secondary phases rich in Sr or La was observed for Mg contents withx >= 0.2.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: It was also noticed that Mg doping preserved the sintering capability of the compounds.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric (TG) measurements from green powders indicated that phase formation occurred above 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) values were close to 10 x 10(-6)K(-1), indicating that (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O(4-delta)layered perovskites are compatible with other SOFC materials.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The electrical properties for single-phase compounds (x= 0.0 and 0.1) were studied by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The total conductivity at 900 degrees C forx= 0.1 was sigma= 1.79 mS cm(-1), whereas forx= 0.0,sigma= 4.94 mu S cm(-1).
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The total conductivity was three orders of magnitude higher forx= 0.1 with respect to the undoped material.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The high activation energy values around 1.5 eV indicated that the transport mechanism was dominated by oxygen vacancy diffusion.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites

Sentencas: The results obtained suggest that LaSrAl(0.9)Mg(0.1)O(4-delta)could be applied as an electrolyte in energy conversion electrochemical systems.
Titulo: Structural characterization and electrochemical properties of (La,Sr)(Al,Mg)O4-δperovskites
